SELECT A.idx_report, B.job_no, A.report_id, A.title, LEFT(REPLACE(A.create_dt,'-','.'),16) AS create_dt, IF((A.d_count_total-A.d_count)=0,'생성완료','생성중') AS status_str FROM KT_REPORT A JOIN KT_PROJECT_JOB_PROJECTID D ON D.idx_project_job_projectid=A.idx_project_job_projectid JOIN KT_PROJECT_JOB B ON B.idx_project_job=D.idx_project_job WHERE (A.idx_user=#{idx_user} OR (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM KT_USER WHERE idx_user=A.idx_user AND user_type IN (11,99))>0) ORDER BY A.idx_report DESC
LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}

SELECT A.title, B.summary0, LEFT(REPLACE(B.create_dt,'-','.'),16) AS create_dt, B.idx_report_data, A.idx_report FROM KT_REPORT A JOIN KT_REPORT_DATA B ON B.idx_report=A.idx_report WHERE A.idx_report=#{idx}

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO KT_REPORT (idx_project, idx_project_job_projectid, idx_user) VALUES (#{idx_project}, #{idx_project_job_projectid}, #{idx_user})

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO KT_REPORT_KEYWORD (idx_report, keyword, keytype, keycount, create_dt) VALUES (#{idx_report}, #{sum_keyword}, #{keytype}, #{keycount}, SYSDATE())
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM KT_REPORT_KEYWORD WHERE idx_report=#{idx_report} AND keyword = #{sum_keyword}

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM KT_REPORT A JOIN KT_PROJECT_JOB_PROJECTID D ON D.idx_project_job_projectid=A.idx_project_job_projectid JOIN KT_PROJECT_JOB B ON B.idx_project_job=D.idx_project_job WHERE CASE WHEN (SELECT user_type FROM KT_USER WHERE idx_user=#{idx_user})=1 THEN A.idx_user=#{idx_user} ELSE 1=1 END

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM KT_DICTIONARY_DATA A JOIN KT_REPORT_KEYWORD B ON A.keyword=B.keyword JOIN KT_DICTIONARY C ON A.idx_dictionary=C.idx_dictionary WHERE A.keyword=#{keywords} AND (C.dic_type = 0 OR C.idx_user = #{idx_user})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO KT_REPORT_FILTER_METADATA (idx_report, speaker, chapter, answer_cnt, word_length, create_dt) VALUES (#{idx_report}, #{speaker}, #{chapter}, 1, #{length}, SYSDATE())
mapper.select: SELECT speaker, sum(answer_cnt) as cnt, sum(word_length) as length FROM KT_REPORT_FILTER_METADATA WHERE idx_report=#{idx_report} GROUP BY speaker
SELECT chapter, speaker, sum(answer_cnt) cnt, sum(word_length) length FROM KT_REPORT_FILTER_METADATA WHERE idx_report=#{idx_report} GROUP BY chapter,speaker
